block.p: I was disappointed that Daniel Smith devoted only two sentences, in his Sept. 4 article, to the issue of ''intelligent design.'' Here is a classic case of the administration ignoring not just decades of scientific research (as with global warming or stem cells) but also a century and a half of careful, documented scientific research in biology and geology. Evolution is truly the idea that makes the rest of biology make sense.
